definition: Potala, winter palace of Dalai Lamas in Lhasa, Tibet
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
variant of 布[bu4]/to announce/to spread
surname Da
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
surname Gong

sentences.english: The Potala stands more superb than ever in the bright sun.
sentences.chinese: 布达拉宫比过去更加壮丽地矗立在灿烂的阳光中。

sentences.english: It's famous for the Potala Palace.
In 1994, the potala palace was listed as world cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 1994年，布达拉宫被列为世界文化遗产。

sentences.english: The main portion of the Potala contains the White Palace and the Red Palace.
sentences.chinese: 布达拉宫主体建筑为白宫和红宫。

sentences.english: Could you show me the imposing and magnificent Potala Palace?
sentences.chinese: 带我去游览雄伟壮观的布达拉宫，如何？

sentences.english: Jokhang Temple , Barkor Market Street and Potola Palace . stay in Lhasa city ;
sentences.chinese: 参观大昭寺，八郭街，布达拉宫。

sentences.english: The gilded bronze-tile roof of Jokhang Temple and Potala Palace in distance.
sentences.chinese: 大昭寺鎏金铜瓦顶和远处的布达拉宫。

sentences.english: Budala Palace was divided in to two kind of building .
sentences.chinese: 布达拉宫由白宫和红宫两种建筑。

sentences.english: D4 Visit Potala Palace, Jokhang Temple and Barkhor Street.
sentences.chinese: 参观布达拉宫，大昭寺和八角街。

sentences.english: Ambassador and Mrs. Huntsman at the Potala Palace.
sentences.chinese: 洪博培大使及夫人在布达拉宫。

sentences.english: The main body of the potala palace building for the white palace and red palace.
sentences.chinese: 布达拉宫的主体建筑为白宫和红宫两部分。

sentences.english: Morning, about 3 miles to the east of Potala is the most revered religious structure in Tibet-Jokhang Temple.
sentences.chinese: 早上，距离布达拉宫大约3米处是保存完好的小昭寺。

sentences.english: The highest hall of Potala was built in 1690.
sentences.chinese: 最高大厅布达拉宫始建于1690年。

sentences.english: A fascinating mixture of the Han and Tibetan cultures and arts.
sentences.chinese: 布达拉宫是汉藏文化艺术的结晶。

sentences.english: The Potala Palace, the city is a pilgrimage destination.
sentences.chinese: 市内的布达拉宫则是朝圣的终点。

sentences.english: One product of this time is kept in Potala Palace.
sentences.chinese: 这一次的产品存放在布达拉宫。

definition: Jokhang, main Buddhist temple in Lhasa, a sacred place of Tibetan Buddhism
Drepung monastery, Lhasa, Tibet
Sera monastery near Lhasa, Tibet
Barkhor street, central business area and pilgrim circuit around Jokhang temple in Lhasa, Tibet
Norbulingka (Tibetan: precious garden), summer residence of Dalai Lamas in Lhasa, Tibet
Ramoche Temple, Lhasa
Ganden monastery, Tibetan: dGa' ldan rNam rgyal gling, Dagzê county 達孜縣|达孜县[Da2 zi1 xian4], Lhasa, Tibet
Labrang monastery, Tibetan: bLa-brang bkra-shis-'khyil, in Xiahe county 夏河縣|夏河县[Xia4 he2 xian4], Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Gansu, formerly Amdo province of Tibet
Namtso or Lake Nam (officially Nam Co), mountain lake at Nakchu in central Tibet
Kumbum (Chinese Ta'er), monastery in Qinhai, formerly Amdo province of Tibet
Yamdrok Lake, Tibet
Lhagang temple in Dartsendo county 康定縣|康定县[Kang1 ding4 xian4], Garze Tibetan autonomous prefecture, Sichuan
Barkhor street, central business area and pilgrim circuit around Jokhang temple in Lhasa, Tibet/same as 八廓街[Ba1 kuo4 Jie1]
Yamdrok Lake, Tibet
Mt Gang Rinpoche in Tibet/also called Mount Kailash
Meilixue or Meri snow mountains, with peaks up to 6000 m., in Diqing Tibetan autonomous prefecture 迪慶藏族自治州|迪庆藏族自治州[Di2 qing4 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
